strapiPost.title: Business Travel Out Of XNA Making A Come Back
strapiPost.content:
Federal data is showing how XNA is looking more and more like its pre-pandemic self. 

  • Baby come back: Voltaire Aviation’s review revealed XNA’s top destinations as Chicago and New York, core business destinations for travelers to and from Northwest Arkansas.
  • Back in business: Chicago and New York were XNA’s top destinations in 2019 before the pandemic interrupted air travel and triggered the rise of remote work. These latest trends suggest business travel is making a resurgence. 

Read more about travel trends HERE.
